newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Summit Medical downgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Summit Medical downgraded.

text.p: --Robertson Stephens healthcare information systems analyst Michael Samols said he downgraded Summit Medical Systems Inc to market performer from buy.
--Shares in the medical outcomes data management systems concern were off 5-3/4 to seven.
--"You've got a credibility issue here," Samols said. Changes are under way at Summit, but uncertainty surrounds a new product line it is launching and its future financial outlook, he said.
--"They are unfortunately in the position now where they are a show-me story from a financial standpoint," he said.
